class_notes: Learning to Lead is a seminar that aims to give first-year students an introductory look at the process of leadership.  This course is only available to first-year students in the Spring of 2021.
course_description: This course explores the questions "Who am I?" and "Why am I here?" This course aims to equip students with the tools to develop their leadership skills and thrive at Oxford.
sections: Class Nbr: 4170, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: OXF, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: V. Roman, Status: Open
